name: isomorphic-git
plan_details: Fully integrated via nucleus/tools/iso_git.mjs. Powers the Phenotype management.

name: PBMint
plan_details: Implemented as nucleus/tools/pbmint_operator.py with systemd service.

name: VisualEngine 2.0
plan_details: Unified OKLCH Material System with Procedural Shaders. Replaces legacy CSS themes.

name: TweakCN
plan_details: Vendored shadcn-toolkit. Integration with GestaltOverlay pending.

name: WebLLM
plan_details: Basic chat interface active. Pending: Service Worker integration for offline model serving.

name: Graphiti
plan_details: Selected as primary Temporal KG. Codebase imported. Pending: Event Bus connector.

name: Mem0
plan_details: Deprioritized. Overlaps with Graphiti and native sqlite-vec. Avoiding 'Memory Schizophrenia'.

name: Crush CLI
plan_details: Basic CLI agent active. Pending: Full TUI integration.

name: OpenCode
plan_details: Investigating unique strengths vs Crush. OpenCode=Navigation/Read, Crush=Editing/Write. Pending: Skills.md mapping.

name: WebMCP
plan_details: Aligned with AuOM. Pending: Standardizing all nucleus/tools as MCP servers.

name: Unstructured
plan_details: Essential for RAG ingestion. Low-risk integration.

name: Cosmopolitan Libc
plan_details: Omega-level lever for 'Run Anywhere' (Supersymmetry). High priority for build pipeline.

name: Mastra
plan_details: Suspect. Likely conflicts with DKIN loop model (similar to Icepick). Audit required.

name: Katana ML
plan_details: Deprioritized. Too heavy/enterprise for local-first substrate.

name: Icepick
plan_details: Deprioritized. DKIN v22 (Amber) solves persistence natively via Git loops.
